attributes.action: SUPPORT NHS STAFF WHO TRAVEL TO WORK USING PUBLIC TRANSPORT.
attributes.additional_details:
I urge the Government to please take this into consideration and make arrangements as soon as possible.So NHS staff members can get to work hassle free.

 Thank you everyone.
attributes.background: Government should provide NHS staff members free of charge transport service to get to work if public transport shut's down or becomes less frequent due to coronavirus. Many NHS staff members across the UK have to travel miles to get to work and rely on public transport.
